query.mssql: SELECT t.Started AS TaskStarted, t.Status AS TaskStatus, t.Discriminator AS TaskDiscriminator, t.Id as TaskId, ag.Id as AssigmentId, ag.Status as AssignmentStatus, ag.Created AssignmentCreated, ag.Discriminator AS AssignmentDiscriminator, ag.ThreadSubject, ag.Subject, r1.Name AS Performer, r2.Name AS PerformerDepartment, CASE WHEN ag.Completed IS NOT NULL THEN DATEDIFF(HOUR, ag.Created, ag.Completed) ELSE DATEDIFF(HOUR, ag.Created, GETDATE()) END AS ProcessHours, e.Id AS EDocId, e.Discriminator AS DocumentDiscriminator, e.RegNumber_Docflow_Sungero AS RegNumber, du.Name AS DocumentKind, e.PayTypeBaseSbe_SBContr_sberdev AS PayType, CASE WHEN e.AccTotalAmount_Docflow_Sungero > 0 THEN e.AccTotalAmount_Docflow_Sungero ELSE e.TotalAmount_Docflow_Sungero END AS TotalAmount, cu.Name AS Currency, CASE WHEN e.ContrTypeBaseS_SBContr_sberdev IS NOT NULL THEN e.ContrTypeBaseS_SBContr_sberdev ELSE e.ContrTypeBase2_SBContr_sberdev END AS Contrtype, dk.Name AS ContrCategory, CASE WHEN m1.Name IS NOT NULL THEN m1.Name ELSE m2.Name END AS MVZ_MVP, CASE WHEN aa1.Name IS NOT NULL THEN aa1.Name ELSE aa2.Name END AS AccArt, CASE WHEN e.AccCParty_Docflow_Sungero IS NOT NULL THEN cp1.Name ELSE cp2.Name END AS Counterparty, e.Created AS DocumentCreated, e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero AS DocumentDate, r3.Name as DocumentAuthor, r4.Name as TaskResponsible, r5.Name as TaskResponsibleDepart FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment ag left JOIN Sungero_WF_Task t ON ag.Task = t.Id left JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment a ON a.Task = t.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r1 ON ag.Performer = r1.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r2 ON r1.Department_Company_Sungero = r2.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r4 ON t.NewAuthorSDev_SBContr_sberdev = r4.Id or t.Author = r4.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r5 ON r4.Department_Company_Sungero = r5.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON a.AttachmentId = e.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r3 ON e.Author = r3.Id LEFT JOIN sberdev_SberCon_MVZ m1 ON e.MVZBaseSberDev_SBContr_sberdev = m1.Id OR e.MVPBaseSberDev_SBContr_sberdev = m1.Id LEFT JOIN sberdev_SberCon_MVZ m2 ON e.MVZBaseSberDe1_SBContr_sberdev = m2.Id OR e.MVPBaseSberDe1_SBContr_sberdev = m2.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Commons_Currency cu ON e.ContrCurrency_Docflow_Sungero = cu.Id OR e.Currency_Docflow_Sungero = cu.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Docflow_DocumentGroup du ON e.DocumentGroup_Docflow_Sungero = du.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Docflow_DocumentKind dk ON e.DocumentKind_Docflow_Sungero = dk.Id LEFT JOIN sberdev_SberCon_AccountingArti aa1 ON e.AccArtExBaseSb_SBContr_sberdev = aa1.Id OR e.AccArtPrBaseSb_SBContr_sberdev = aa1.Id LEFT JOIN sberdev_SberCon_AccountingArti aa2 ON e.AccArtBaseSber_SBContr_sberdev = aa2.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Parties_Counterparty cp1 ON e.AccCParty_Docflow_Sungero = cp1.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Parties_Counterparty cp2 ON e.Counterparty_Docflow_Sungero = cp2.Id WHERE a.[Group] = '08E1EF90-521F-41A1-A13F-C6F175007E54' and e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero >= @startDate and e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero <= @endDate

WITH CTE as ( SELECT DISTINCT CASE WHEN CHARINDEX('(', r.Name) > 0 AND CHARINDEX(')', r.Name) > 0 AND r.Name IS NOT NULL THEN RTRIM(REPLACE(r.Name, ' ПП', '')) END as PP FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment a LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r ON r.Id = a.Performer WHERE a.Status != 'InProcess' and Created >= @startDate and Created <= @endDate ) SELECT PP FROM CTE WHERE PP IS NOT NULL;

WITH TaskCounts AS ( SELECT e.Discriminator AS DocumentDiscriminator, COUNT(*) AS TotalTaskCount, SUM(CASE WHEN LastAssignment.Completed <= t.MaxDeadline OR LastAssignment.Completed <= t.Deadline THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ConditionTaskCount FROM Sungero_WF_Task t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ag.Task, MAX(ag.Created) AS MaxCreated FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment ag GROUP BY ag.Task ) AS LatestAssignment ON t.Id = LatestAssignment.Task LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Assignment LastAssignment ON LastAssignment.Task = LatestAssignment.Task AND LastAssignment.Created = LatestAssignment.MaxCreated LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment a ON a.Task = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON a.AttachmentId = e.Id WHERE t.Status = 'Completed' AND t.Discriminator NOT IN ('83f2a537-0cf0-4429-ae76-e9a386ca53aa', '00ac21cf-6ad9-4a50-b0c5-a73d87f6438f', '1e5b11de-bd28-4dc2-a03c-74b8db9ac1c4', 'ae03c598-ab50-4781-b1b2-968510b338b9') AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero >= @startDate AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero <= @endDate GROUP BY e.Discriminator ),
AvgAprTime AS ( SELECT e.Discriminator AS DocumentDiscriminator, AVG(DATEDIFF(HOUR, t.Started, LastAssignment.Completed) / 24.0) AS AvgAprTime FROM Sungero_WF_Task t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ag.Task, MAX(ag.Created) AS MaxCreated FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment ag GROUP BY ag.Task ) AS LatestAssignment ON t.Id = LatestAssignment.Task LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Assignment LastAssignment ON LastAssignment.Task = LatestAssignment.Task AND LastAssignment.Created = LatestAssignment.MaxCreated LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment a ON a.Task = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON a.AttachmentId = e.Id WHERE t.Status = 'Completed' AND t.Discriminator NOT IN ('83f2a537-0cf0-4429-ae76-e9a386ca53aa', '00ac21cf-6ad9-4a50-b0c5-a73d87f6438f', '1e5b11de-bd28-4dc2-a03c-74b8db9ac1c4', 'ae03c598-ab50-4781-b1b2-968510b338b9') AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero >= @startDate AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero <= @endDate GROUP BY e.Discriminator HAVING AVG(DATEDIFF(HOUR, t.Started, LastAssignment.Completed) / 24.0) > 0 ),
AvgRwkAssigns AS ( SELECT e.Discriminator AS DocumentDiscriminator, COUNT(CASE WHEN ag.Discriminator = '040862cd-a46f-4366-b068-e659c7acaea6' THEN 1 END) * 1.0 / COUNT(*) AS AvgRwkAssigns FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment ag LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Task t ON ag.Task = t.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment a ON a.Task = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON a.AttachmentId = e.Id WHERE a.[Group] = '08E1EF90-521F-41A1-A13F-C6F175007E54' AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero >= @startDate AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero <= @endDate GROUP BY e.Discriminator HAVING AVG(CASE WHEN ag.Discriminator = '040862cd-a46f-4366-b068-e659c7acaea6' THEN 1.0 ELSE 0.0 END) > 0 )
SELECT CAST(TaskCounts.DocumentDiscriminator AS VARCHAR(250)) as DocumentDiscriminator, CAST(CASE WHEN TotalTaskCount > 0 THEN ConditionTaskCount * 1.0 / TotalTaskCount ELSE 0.000 END AS FLOAT) AS TaskCompletedInDeadline, CAST(AvgAprTime.AvgAprTime AS FLOAT) AS AvgAprTime, CAST(AvgRwkAssigns.AvgRwkAssigns AS FLOAT) AS AvgRwkAssigns FROM TaskCounts LEFT JOIN AvgAprTime ON TaskCounts.DocumentDiscriminator = AvgAprTime.DocumentDiscriminator LEFT JOIN AvgRwkAssigns ON TaskCounts.DocumentDiscriminator = AvgRwkAssigns.DocumentDiscriminator;

WITH TaskCountsPerDepartment AS ( SELECT COALESCE(r2.Name, 'NULL_DEPARTMENT') AS InitiatorDepartment, t.Id AS TaskId, SUM(CASE WHEN ag.Discriminator = '040862cd-a46f-4366-b068-e659c7acaea6' THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS AssignmentCountWithDiscriminator FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment ag LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Task t ON ag.Task = t.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment a ON a.Task = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON a.AttachmentId = e.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r1 ON e.Author = r1.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r2 ON r1.Department_Company_Sungero = r2.Id WHERE a.[Group] = '08E1EF90-521F-41A1-A13F-C6F175007E54' AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero >= @startDate AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero <= @endDate GROUP BY r2.Name, t.Id ),
AvgTaskCountPerDepartment AS ( SELECT InitiatorDepartment, AVG(CAST(AssignmentCountWithDiscriminator AS FLOAT)) AS AvgRwkAssignsPerTask FROM TaskCountsPerDepartment GROUP BY InitiatorDepartment ),
AvgApprovalTimeCTE AS ( SELECT COALESCE(r2.Name, 'NULL_DEPARTMENT') AS InitiatorDepartment, CAST(AVG(DATEDIFF(HOUR, t.Started, LastAssignment.Completed) / 24.0) AS FLOAT) AS AvgApprovalTimeInDays FROM Sungero_WF_Task t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ag.Task, MAX(ag.Created) AS MaxCreated FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment ag GROUP BY ag.Task ) AS LatestAssignment ON t.Id = LatestAssignment.Task LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Assignment LastAssignment ON LastAssignment.Task = LatestAssignment.Task AND LastAssignment.Created = LatestAssignment.MaxCreated LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment a ON a.Task = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON a.AttachmentId = e.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r1 ON e.Author = r1.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r2 ON r1.Department_Company_Sungero = r2.Id WHERE t.Status = 'Completed' AND t.Discriminator NOT IN ('83f2a537-0cf0-4429-ae76-e9a386ca53aa', '00ac21cf-6ad9-4a50-b0c5-a73d87f6438f', '1e5b11de-bd28-4dc2-a03c-74b8db9ac1c4', 'ae03c598-ab50-4781-b1b2-968510b338b9') AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero >= @startDate AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero <= @endDate GROUP BY r2.Name ),
TaskCountsCTE AS ( SELECT COALESCE(r2.Name, 'NULL_DEPARTMENT') AS InitiatorDepartment, COUNT(*) AS TotalTaskCount, SUM(CASE WHEN LastAssignment.Completed <= t.MaxDeadline OR LastAssignment.Completed <= t.Deadline THEN 1 ELSE 0 END) AS ConditionTaskCount FROM Sungero_WF_Task t LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ag.Task, MAX(ag.Created) AS MaxCreated FROM Sungero_WF_Assignment ag GROUP BY ag.Task ) AS LatestAssignment ON t.Id = LatestAssignment.Task LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Assignment LastAssignment ON LastAssignment.Task = LatestAssignment.Task AND LastAssignment.Created = LatestAssignment.MaxCreated LEFT JOIN Sungero_WF_Attachment a ON a.Task = t.Id INNER JOIN Sungero_Content_EDoc e ON a.AttachmentId = e.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r1 ON e.Author = r1.Id LEFT JOIN Sungero_Core_Recipient r2 ON r1.Department_Company_Sungero = r2.Id WHERE t.Status = 'Completed' AND t.Discriminator NOT IN ('83f2a537-0cf0-4429-ae76-e9a386ca53aa', '00ac21cf-6ad9-4a50-b0c5-a73d87f6438f', '1e5b11de-bd28-4dc2-a03c-74b8db9ac1c4', 'ae03c598-ab50-4781-b1b2-968510b338b9') AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero >= @startDate AND e.DocumentDate_Docflow_Sungero <= @endDate GROUP BY r2.Name ),
CombinedCTE AS ( SELECT COALESCE(atc.InitiatorDepartment, aat.InitiatorDepartment, tcc.InitiatorDepartment) AS InitiatorDepartment, COALESCE(CAST(atc.AvgRwkAssignsPerTask AS FLOAT), 0.0000) AS AvgTaskCount, COALESCE(CAST(aat.AvgApprovalTimeInDays AS FLOAT), 0.000) AS AvgApprovalTimeInDays, CASE WHEN tcc.TotalTaskCount > 0 THEN CAST(tcc.ConditionTaskCount AS FLOAT) / tcc.TotalTaskCount ELSE 0.000 END AS TaskCompletedInDeadline FROM AvgTaskCountPerDepartment atc FULL OUTER JOIN AvgApprovalTimeCTE aat ON atc.InitiatorDepartment = aat.InitiatorDepartment FULL OUTER JOIN TaskCountsCTE tcc ON COALESCE(atc.InitiatorDepartment, aat.InitiatorDepartment) = tcc.InitiatorDepartment )
SELECT CAST(InitiatorDepartment AS VARCHAR(250)) as InitiatorDepartment, AVG(AvgTaskCount) AS AvgRwkAssigns, AVG(AvgApprovalTimeInDays) AS AvgAprTime, AVG(TaskCompletedInDeadline) AS TaskCompletedInDeadline FROM CombinedCTE GROUP BY InitiatorDepartment ORDER BY InitiatorDepartment;
